name: Encounter with Friendly Traders
description: You encounter a group of friendly traders. They offer to exchange goods with you.

name: Ambush by Bandits
description: Your caravan is ambushed by bandits. Prepare for a battle!

name: Lost in the Fog
description: A dense fog descends, making it challenging to navigate. Progress slows down.

name: Heavy Rainfall
description: Heavy rainfall creates muddy paths. Travel becomes difficult.

name: Harsh Blizzard
description: A fierce blizzard hits. The caravan is forced to halt due to extreme weather conditions.

name: Bounty of Wildlife
description: You come across an area rich in wildlife. Hunting is plentiful, providing extra resources.

name: Aid from a Friendly Settlement
description: A nearby settlement offers assistance and supplies. Your caravan is grateful.

name: Mechanical Breakdown
description: One of your wagons breaks down. Caravan progress is slowed until repairs are completed.

name: Unexpected Illness
description: A member of your caravan falls ill. Medical supplies are needed for recovery.

name: Crossroads Decision
description: You reach a crossroads. A decision must be made on the path to take.

name: Mysterious Artifact
description: A mysterious artifact is discovered on the trail. Its origin and purpose are unknown.

name: Festival Celebration
description: You stumble upon a festival celebration in a nearby town. Join in the festivities!

name: Cattle Stampede
description: A sudden cattle stampede crosses your path. Navigate carefully to avoid chaos.

name: Eagle Eye's View
description: An eagle circles overhead, signaling potential danger or opportunity ahead.

name: Sacred Ground Encounter
description: You stumble upon a sacred ground. Approach with respect or face consequences.

name: Eldritch Phenomenon
description: An otherworldly phenomenon occurs, sparking awe and fear among your caravan members.

name: Hidden Cave Discovery
description: A hidden cave is discovered along the trail. Explore its depths for potential treasures.

name: Friendly Nomadic Encounter
description: Nomadic travelers join your caravan temporarily, sharing stories and skills.

name: Quicksand Peril
description: Quicksand poses a danger on the trail. Navigate cautiously to avoid mishaps.

name: Celestial Phenomenon
description: A rare celestial event graces the night sky, bringing wonder and reflection to your caravan.

name: Fertile Soil Discovery
description: You find an area with exceptionally fertile soil. Consider stopping to cultivate crops for additional supplies.

name: Ancient Ruins Encounter
description: Your caravan stumbles upon ancient ruins. Explore for historical artifacts and potential discoveries.

name: Wildfire Threat
description: A distant wildfire poses a threat to your route. Plan a detour to avoid potential danger.

name: Cursed Artefact
description: A mysterious artefact is discovered. Its presence brings an unsettling aura. Handle with caution.

name: Enchanted Oasis
description: An enchanted oasis appears in the desert. Resting here provides magical benefits.

name: Avalanche Threat
description: Traversing through mountainous terrain, an avalanche risk becomes imminent. Evaluate the best path forward.

name: Geyser Spectacle
description: Discover a mesmerizing geyser field. Enjoy the natural spectacle and potential benefits for the journey.

name: Haunted Forest
description: Enter a mysterious, haunted forest. Your caravan must navigate through eerie surroundings with caution.

name: Trade Route Discovery
description: Stumble upon an ancient trade route. Follow it for potential shortcuts and trade opportunities.

name: Lost Traveler Encounter
description: Encounter a lost traveler seeking refuge. Offer assistance and potentially gain a valuable ally.
